title: 50 acre estate surrounded by lake near Galle
details: A rare development opportunity to buy all or part of this magnificent cinnamon estate comprising two large elevated peninsulas on this tranquil lake just north of Galle. Potential for a mixed use leisure development with hotels, spas, and villa development, all with the utmost privacy as most of the land is surrounded by water. A must see for any large developer. Serious enquiries only.
